Load packages
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(raster)
library(habtools)
library(rgdal)
library(plot3D)
```

```{r}
dem1_s <- raster("data/Bommie_1_South.tif")
dem2_s <- raster("data/Bommie_2_South.tif")
```

Plot some dems
```{r}
plot(dem1_s)
plot(dem20_s)
plot(dem22_s)
plot(dem15_s)
plot(dem31_s)
```

Looks decent, check resolution
```{r}
res(dem1_s)
res(dem20_s)
res(dem22_s)
res(dem15_s)
res(dem31_s)
```

Calculate RDH for all dems
```{r}
comp1_S <- rdh(dem1_s, lvec = c(0.125, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2))


```
